TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IConnectionPointContainer

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

Docs.summary: Provides an implementation of the OLE DB interface for use by applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public newslot virtual instance void EnumConnectionPoints(class Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IEnumConnectionPoints enumC) cil managed

Docs.param: When the method returns, this parameter contains the interface pointer of the enumerator. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Creates an enumerator of all the connection points supported in the connectable object, one connection point per IID.

MemberSignature.Value: public void FindConnectionPoint (ref Guid riid, out Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IConnectionPoint cp);
.method public newslot virtual instance void FindConnectionPoint(valuetype System.Guid riid, class Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IConnectionPoint cp) cil managed

Docs.param: A reference to the outgoing interface IID whose connection point is being requested.
When the method returns, this parameter contains the connection point that manages the outgoing interface `riid`. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Queries the connectable object about whether it has a connection point for a particular IID, and, if so, returns the interface pointer to that connection point.
